about.title: Welcome to Padel Essence
about.description: At Padel Essence, we're passionate about padel. Our mission is simple: to provide players of all levels with the best gear, apparel, and accessories to elevate their game. Whether you're just starting out or a seasoned pro, we’ve got everything you need to dominate the court.
about.description_2: We understand that padel isn’t just a sport—it’s a lifestyle. That’s why we carefully curate our collection to include top brands, innovative products, and the latest trends. From rackets to shoes, and everything in between, we're here to make sure you have the tools to succeed.
about.list_1: Quality You Can Trust: We only stock products we’d use ourselves.
about.list_2: Expert Guidance: Not sure what you need? Our team of padel enthusiasts is here to help.
about.list_3: Fast & Reliable Service: From easy online shopping to quick delivery, we make it simple to gear up.
about.ending: Join our growing community of padel players who share the same passion for the game. At Padel Essence, we’re more than a store—we’re your partner on and off the court.

shipping_return_policy.title: Shipping and Return Policy

shipping_list.list_1: We offer fast and reliable shipping across worldwide.
shipping_list.list_2: Orders are processed within 1-3 business days and shipped via DHL, UPS.
shipping_list.list_3: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location and order weight.
shipping_list.list_4: Free shipping is available for orders over 200€.

shipping_return_policy.delivery_description: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with tracking information.

return_list.list_1: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery.
return_list.list_2: Items must be unused, in their original condition, and in the original packaging.
return_list.list_3: To initiate a return, contact us at padelessence@gmail.com with your order number and reason for the return.
return_list.list_4: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is defective or incorrect.

refund_list.list_1: Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.
refund_list.list_2: Refunds will be issued to the original payment method.

shipping_return_policy.refund_description: If you have any questions about our shipping or return policies, feel free to contact us at padelessence@gmail.com.

question_1.question: How can I track my order?
question_1.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number and a link to track your package.

question_2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
question_2.answer: We accept major credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment methods.

question_3.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
question_3.answer: If your order has not yet been shipped, you can contact us at padelessence@gmail.com to request changes or cancellations.

question_4.question: What is your return policy?
question_4.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be unused and in their original packaging. Please contact us at padelessence@gmail.com to initiate a return.

question_5.question: Do you offer free shipping?
question_5.answer: Yes, free shipping is available for orders over 200€.

question_6.question: Are the products authentic?
question_6.answer: Yes, we only sell 100% authentic products from trusted brands.

question_7.question: Do you ship internationally?
question_7.answer: Yes, we ship to many countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times will be calculated at checkout.

question_8.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged or incorrect item?
question_8.answer: Please contact us immediately at [email address] with photos of the item, and we will resolve the issue promptly.

question_9.question: How do I contact customer support?
question_9.answer: You can reach us at [email address] or through our contact form on the website.
